products.title: Fretwork Linen Roman Blind
products.description: Multi tones of neutral layer upon one another in the soft geometric pattern of fretwork linen to create a simple yet intricate roman blind. And it does so wonderfully. Whether you want to liven up a calm scene or tone down an eccentric space with a neutral number, this blind c multi tones of neutral layer upon one another in the soft geometric pattern of fretwork linen to create a simple yet intricate roman blind.

products.title: Dawn Chorus Mineral Blue Roman Blind
products.description: This dawn chorus mineral blue roman blind appeals to both young and old, with pale blue birds balancing on the branches of an ever-growing neutral tree. The romantic nature of the design makes it an excellent choice to carry a room all the way from a nursery for a new born to this dawn chorus mineral blue roman blind appeals to both young and old, with pale blue birds balancing on the branches of an ever-growing neutral tree.

products.title: Yoki Sapphire Roman Blind
products.description: Set the scene right with the beautifully cool yoki sapphire roman blind creating a fresh and funky setting within your home and bringing superior style. With smooth materials and polished oaks accessorizing this blind, the theme really starts to come together, with a look that set the scene right with the beautifully cool yoki sapphire roman blind creating a fresh and funky setting within your home and bringing superior style.

products.title: Passaro Pewter Roman Blind
products.description: Bright, beautiful and majestic birds stroll the scene of grey upon the passaro pewter roman blind to create a lovely vibrant sight of fun and frolics. Strawberry red, orangeade and aqua work together in sweet harmony, with the pewter grey emphasizing their vibrancy and energy.

products.title: Blomma Kiwi Roman Blind
products.description: With the look of a hand-painted design, the blomma kiwi roman blind carries a gentle look with it, dressed with magnificent fruity shapes and textured leafy stems. And with the fruity pattern, this blind looks best in fun family kitchens, where a light an airy feeling prevails with the look of a hand-painted design, the blomma kiwi roman blind carries a gentle look with it, dressed with magnificent fruity shapes and textured leafy stems.

products.title: Sixties Stem Misty Grey Roman Blind
products.description: This luxurious cut velvet fabric from orla kiely will bring some stunning retro charm to your home. Picked out in a stylish and contemporary grey, it is easy to use and incredibly versatile. The pattern is full of 60s flair, as the name suggests, and will liven up any space. Mean this luxurious cut velvet fabric from orla kiely will bring some stunning retro charm to your home.

products.title: Sixties Stem Charcoal Roman Blind
products.description: Sixties stem charcoal is a luxurious fabric, featuring a cut velvet pattern of a floral stem on a thick background. This recognisable orla kiely design will add a retro tone to your interior. The softness of the velvet is unrivalled, creating a cosy and cosseting appeal. Add your sixties stem charcoal is a luxurious fabric, featuring a cut velvet pattern of a floral stem on a thick background.

products.title: Fiji, Duckegg - Roman Blind
products.description: Incorporate the current and calming duck egg blue to your dcor with the alluring fiji range. A fusion of voile-like fabric and rich silky threads with a metallic sheen form an elegant blind with a subtle texture and refreshing blue hues. Renovate a basic white bedroom with the impressive duck egg by including plenty of eye-catching features and accessories in alike tones. Combine with gleaming sheer fabrics and steely oddments to continue a metallic theme with grace and modern style.

products.title: Basketweave, Cream - Roman Blind
products.description: The relaxed yet plush cloth used for the basketweave cream is both attractive and functional. The thick, chenille-esque material produces a warm and cosy blind, whilst the criss-cross weave gives off provides a deep and textured finish. Ideal for adding a neutral, tempering tone to a luxe dining room, this blind is best combined with stronger and bolder shades. Try it with a deep forest green, adding hits of lime for colour and modernity, or with a plum purple shade, accented by pretty lilacs.

products.title: Basketweave, Black - Roman Blind
products.description: In striking ebony, the basketweave black offers a cool, contemporary colour on a contrastingly warm, traditional fabric. The criss-cross weave and thick thread make the blind sturdy and textured, though still surprisingly nimble. Use the black as a more conspicuous neutral, setting it against a bright lime or cobalt blue to tame the wild shades. Either would make an impactful colour scheme for a contemporary living room or bedroom when accented with matching bedlinen, wall art, and fun ornaments.

products.title: Lugano Silver Roman Blind
products.description: With a wonderful, rich texture giving the fabric plenty of character and charm, this lugano silver roman blind has splendor oozing out of it. The metallic shade brings a touch of sophistication to your room, whilst also creating the perfect backdrop for traditional features an with a wonderful, rich texture giving the fabric plenty of character and charm, this lugano silver roman blind has splendor oozing out of it.

products.title: Little Orchard Scarlet Roman Blind
products.description: Give your home an autumnal glow all year round with the elegant little orchard scarlet roman blind. Romantic and organic, this blind has a subtle textured base, perfect for pairing with smooth oak and neutral linen. With varying intensities of scarlet red, this blind is neit give your home an autumnal glow all year round with the elegant little orchard scarlet roman blind.

products.title: Little Orchard Evergreen Roman Blind
products.description: I see trees of green. No red roses here though, this little orchard evergreen roman blind is all about the towering trees that adorn the fabric. The organic green colouring of the pattern adds a further natural touch to this design, making this an ideal choice for those of yo i see trees of green.

products.title: Longridge, Eau De Nil - Roman Blind
products.description: A watery blue meets pure white and gentle grey in the fresh longridge eau de nil. The blind and its pattern has a somewhat mediterranean feel to it, traditional of the longridge range, yet still offers a contemporary take on a classically shaped roman. Opt for a modern colour scheme in the guest bedroom by choosing wall walls as the base, and using matching duck eggs and dove greys in your soft furnishings to bring out the hues in the blind.

products.title: Flamingos, Sand - Roman Blind
products.description: The muted blues and soft salmon pinks in the flamingos sand merge with the sandy beige base to create a truly stunning aesthetic. The flamingos are beautifully drawn, sitting pretty against their softly sketched background. Turn the sand into a sensational piece of artwork by hanging it in the master bedroom, where surrounding it with similarly toned shades of blue and coral will pull out the colours of the blind wonderfully.

products.title: Hedgerow, Pistachio - Roman Blind
products.description: Using a range of shades from the same spectrum, the pistachio, from the floral hedgerow collection, offers bright, contemporary colour. Tropical green complements bright teal, which accents soft duck egg, and so on, all tamed by subtle slate greys and gentle blacks. Create a tropical rainforest colour scheme in your master bedroom, whilst still maintaining an orthodox floral patterning as your base.

products.title: Flamingos, Pink - Roman Blind
products.description: Adorned in palest pinks and pretty greys, flamingos pink has a somewhat retro vibe to it, making it the ideal addition to give a contemporary home a little edge. The cotton fabric is high quality and folds neatly into the gentle pleats of the roman blind. Add the pink to the bathroom for an unusual yet appealing look, matching with stone greys and the occasional fuchsia. Alternatively, use it as a feature in a main or guest bedroom, opting for barely there grey walls and baby pink bedding.

products.title: Hedgerow, Magenta - Roman Blind
products.description: Bright and striking, the hedgerow magenta uses pinks, limes, and plums to add a fun vibrancy to its pretty and modern floral pattern. The varying shades complement each other perfectly, resulting in a colourful yet coordinated window covering. You'll want as much of the magenta on display as possible, so use it on a large window and in a room where it will be closed often. Place against a matching plum wall for impact, and use the pale lime and hot fuschia as accent colours for your oddments and knick-knacks.

products.title: Vw Campervan, Blue - Roman Blind
products.description: If you're a free spirit at heart, then you'll love the vw campervan blue. A creamy beige fabric, made from 100% cotton, is home to an array of these cute vehicles depicted from a variety of angles. Blue is the main colour here, alongside other accents, and the effect is sweet and charming. Go for a fun and inviting look in your guest bedroom by including the blue. Keep the room looking light and airy with whites, beiges, and other neutrals, throwing in the occasional blue or red for character.

products.title: Vw Campervan, Pink - Roman Blind
products.description: Cute and characterful, the vw campervan pink is a charming roman blind, featuring a creamy oatmeal background adorned with fun imagery of campervans in varying colours, with pink as the feature colour. The pink would charm guests in your spare bedroom. Keep the room feeling light and airy, adding in splashes of pink for a real colour pop. If you really love these iconic vehicles, consider a retro wall print to really bring the theme to life.

products.title: William Morris Acanthus Vintage Blue Roman Blind
products.description: The bold intertwined leaves of the acanthus vintage blue roman blind make this a beautifully striking blind, a bold design statement for any window. An iconic design from their william morris range in collaboration with the v&a, the vintage blue colour palette offers a calm s the bold intertwined leaves of the acanthus vintage blue roman blind make this a beautifully striking blind, a bold design statement for any window.

products.title: William Morris Acanthus Velvet Forest Roman Blind
products.description: The acanthus velvet forest roman blind showcases the exquisite sensibilities of classic william morris design, and beautifully blends a gorgeous contemporary colour palette with a rich, deep-pile velvet. Part of their collaboration with the v&a, william morris believed that a the acanthus velvet forest roman blind showcases the exquisite sensibilities of classic william morris design, and beautifully blends a gorgeous contemporary colour palette with a rich, deep-pile velvet.

products.title: Out And About, Paintbox - Roman Blind
products.description: Window coverings don't get much livelier or more vibrant than the ever-bustling out and about in paintbox which does in fact feature a whole rainbow of colours. From elephants to bicycles, from the city to the jungle, this blind really does have everything to offer. The paintbox was just made to capture a child's imagination and get them talking and playing, so include it in their bedroom or playroom.

products.title: Lovebirds, Pebble - Roman Blind
products.description: The tropical tones of the lovebirds pebble are tempered by beautiful pebble greys and soft whites, allowing the greens, yellows, and pinky reds to really pop from the fabric. The foliage and bird pattern is ornate and eye-catching, and sure to get conversation started. Give the pebble a home in your study, where the bold and vivacious colours can inspire creativity and hard work. Keep the room feeling light and airy with white or palest grey walls, contemporary furniture, and light wooden floors.

products.title: Lovebirds, Spring - Roman Blind
products.description: The colours of the lovebirds in spring are as lively and vivacious as the season itself, with blues, greens, reds, and yellows taking centre stage against an icy white background, which really makes those bold hues pop. Hang the spring wherever you need a serious injection of colour, be it a guest bedroom, a hallway, or your living room. Include a boldly toned feature wall and accent throughout the room with other tropical hues, adding tones of white and grey where needed to temper.

products.title: Lovebirds, Blossom - Roman Blind
products.description: Inspired by the creative ebb and flow of natural colour, lovebirds blossom transports your eye back to the era of the watercolour masters. The reds and greens move gracefully across the fabric and trace out an artistic print as they go. A unique way to add a real flourish to your dcor. Transform the guest bedroom with a helping hand from lovebirds blossom. A matching lampshade and set of scatter cushions are a must-have.

products.title: Grove, Saxon Blue - Roman Blind
products.description: Adorned with pretty blue florals and foliage, the grove in saxon blue combines its title colour with gentle pinks and greens for a summery look that you'll love all year round. Its 100% cotton fabric ensures you a high quality, touchable material that's easy to use. Add the saxon blue to your hallway for a colourful welcome to your home. Keep the walls cream or palest blue, and accent throughout with naturally toned blues and pinks.

products.title: Grove, Auburn - Roman Blind
products.description: A pretty country roman blind, the grove in auburn features artistic florals in autumnal tones of red, rust, lilac, and green, among others, and the look is strikingly understated. The cotton fabric means it's soft and supple yet strong and sturdy, so will sit beautifully in neat roman folds. The auburn surely belongs in the kitchen, set amidst other country hues. Think cream walls and sage green kitchen units and cupboards, with rusty oranges and rural mauves accenting across the board.

products.title: Grove, Fennel - Roman Blind
products.description: The light and understated mood of the grove fennel is enough to add a gentle elegance to any room. A grey-toned white forms the base, and is adorned by lightly drawn watercolour florals in muted mustards, pale mints, and soft fuchsias, giving a wonderfully refreshing feel to the fabric. The fennel would look perfect in a light and airy kitchen, where it will sit pretty amongst soft ivories and mint greens.

products.title: Grove, Rosemist - Roman Blind
products.description: Understated and subtle, the pretty pinks of the grove in rosemist are a treat to the eye. On a creamy background, watercolour-style florals and foliage give this blind a summery, yet somewhat ethereal, look that you'll just love. If you love an unusual look in the kitchen, colour it pink and cream, and give the rosemist centre stage. Surround with cream units and pale pink walls, accenting with carefully picked utensils in matching pink tones.

products.title: Aquataine, Eau De Nil - Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring must-have shade of aqua, the charming aquitaine eau de nil hosts a sprightly background of duck egg blue, adorned with a creative and appealing botanic illustration. The artistically sketched florals in contemporary white and subdued grey gives the blind delicate detail for a unique and elegant style. Incorporate the delightful eau de nil within a calm and soothing palette of sky blues and whites to create a coordinating and fresh background in your dining room.
